SvgShapes.Components.SvgFiltersComponent Class

Defined in: addon/components/svg-filters.js:7
Module: ember-svg-shapes

SvgFiltersComponent

This component can be used as a container for filter elements that can then be applied to other SVG elements on the page.

{{#svg-filters}}
  // ... put filters here
{{/svg-filters}}

An example applying a drop shadow:

{{#svg-filters}}
  {{filter-drop-shadow id="drop-shadow" dx="2" dy="4"}}
{{/svg-filters}}

Set the filter attribute of the SVG shape component to the id of the filter component.

{{svg-triangle filter="drop-shadow"}}
  • Index
  • Properties

Item Index

Properties

  • className
  • tagName

Properties

className

Array private

Defined in addon/components/svg-filters.js:47

This is an array of class names to be added to the svg element.

Default: ['ember-svg-shapes', 'svg-filters']

tagName

String private

Defined in addon/components/svg-filters.js:39

Default: 'svg'
